name: devtools
description: Development tools plugin providing specialized agents and slash commands for code review, debugging, planning, and Git workflow automation

agents.name: code-reviewer
agents.description: Code quality and security review specialist

agents.name: data-scientist
agents.description: Data analysis, SQL queries, and BigQuery specialist

agents.name: strategic-planner
agents.description: Feature planning and technical design specialist

commands.name: commit:create
commands.description: Create git commits from staged changes
